about-text:
Hi, I'm Francisco Javier Frías Serrano, a web developer with training in systems administration and application development. I have worked with technologies such as PHP, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Oracle, both in plugin development and in the maintenance of complex web applications.

Throughout my experience, I have collaborated on projects using frameworks like Laravel, CakePHP, and CodeIgniter, as well as CMS platforms like WordPress and Moodle. I enjoy writing clean code and working in teams using agile methodologies, integrating tools like Git, Jira, and Slack into my daily workflow.

I'm currently focused on continuing to grow as a developer, exploring new technologies, and sharing my personal projects on GitHub.
contact-text: You can contact me at my email: javifs94@gmail.com
project1-description: A front-end project that replicates the look and feel of Netflix’s interface. Built with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and jQuery, it focuses on creating a responsive design, smooth animations, and an engaging user experience.
project2-description: A PHP application that converts numerical values into their textual representation in Spanish, including currency formatting for EUROS and CENTS.
